DOC.brief_summary: This study is being done to study stent deformation on persons with de novo coronary lesions to determine how much deformation takes place and how often. The information gathered from the group that receives the Promus element stent will be compared to other groups that receive other contemporary drug eluting stents.
DOC.criteria: Patients, male or female, 18 years or older; Patients with denovo coronary lesions and slated to receive a Promus Element stent; Patients who are slated to undergo IVUS after stent deployment during implantation procedure Patients receiving more than one drugeluting stent within the same lesion during implantation procedure; Patients with instent restenosis; Patients who had IVUS imaging attained with manual pullback.
